title: [Proposal] Deal Access Tiers
body:
# Motivation:
The goal of this proposal is to introduce new and refined tiers for investors with an aim to increase demand for SHN, reflecting current market conditions.

# New Deal Access
By acquiring a predefined amount of Shine tokens (SHN), you get the right to participate in seed sales and IDOs of incubated projects, as well as access to the Investor Hub.

Tier 1: >15.000 SHN (Seed-sale ❌, IDO ✅)
Tier 2: >50.000 SHN (Seed-sale ❌, IDO ✅)
Tier 3: >200.000 SHN (Seed-sale ✅, IDO ✅)
Committee tier: >400.00 SHN (Seed-sale ✅, IDO ✅, Committee power ✅)

Minimum number of tokens needed, in order to get access to the investments, is 15.000 SHN (Tier 1). As Tier 1 minimum cap/person is $250. Maximal cap/person depends on the deal size, your SHN holdings, and other members’ interest in that deal! 

Tier 3 and Committee tier will have guaranteed access to Seed-sale in all deals.

# Example:
Project x has Tier 1 cap/person of $300. 

**Roughly we will try to stick to:**
Tier 1: 1x  ($300)

Tier 2: 2-4x  ($600-$1200)

Tier 3: 4-8x  ($1200-$2400)

Committee: 8-15x 
($2400-$4500)
author: 0xb1D92EEec6f9F224ABD294DE643C94A01cB14E51
